title: Jennybai/issue8517
body:
Fixes [#8517](https://github.com/dotnet/msbuild/issues/8517)

### Changes Made

Add feature request template

nodes.body:
From the examples of dotnet/runtime's [API proposal](https://github.com/dotnet/runtime/issues/new?assignees=&labels=api-suggestion&template=02_api_proposal.yml&title=%5BAPI+Proposal%5D%3A+) and dotnet/roslyn's [IDE Feature suggestion](https://github.com/dotnet/roslyn/issues/new?assignees=&labels=Feature+Request%2CArea-IDE&template=feature-suggestion.md&title=), maybe the following sections would work for a Feature Request template?

- Summary
- Background and Motivation
- Proposed Feature
- Alternative Designs
- Risks

```suggestion
      description: Include as much information about how the feature works as possible.
```
